story.text: Jan 4 ALL TIMES IN EST/GMT --------------------------------------------------------- Labor Dept issues weekly Jobless Claims, 0830/1330 U.S. Chamber of Commerce President Thomas Donohue holds media briefing to discuss the Chamber's policy priorities and the economic outlook, 0930/1430 Commerce Dept. issues Factory Orders for November, 1000/1500 National Association of Realtors issues Pending Home Sales for November Energy Information Administration weekly petroleum stocks and output data, 1030/1530 American Petroleum Institute weekly national petroleum report, 1030/1530 Freddie Mac issues weekly U.S. mortgage rates, after 1100/1600 Treasury Dept. weekly announcement of 3- and 6-month bill sale offerings, 1100/1600 ---------------------------------------------------------- DIARY - Federal Reserve Events [FED/DIARY] U.S. Indicators [US/ECI] U.S. Treasury new issues calendar [US/C]
story.title: diary - today in washington - jan 4
